title: Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace
description: When trying to assign a command to Ctrl+Backspace in the keybinding manager, it displays Ctrl+Del instead. This issue occurs on a Swiss German keyboard with Swiss German locale.
OB: The expected behavior is that Ctrl+Backspace should delete the previous word.
EB: Instead, the keybinding manager thinks Ctrl+Backspace is Ctrl+Del and deletes the next word.
SR: To resolve this issue, the keybinding manager should correctly recognize Ctrl+Backspace and allow it to be assigned to a command.
